page.title: 19SCHOOLCHILDREN'S FASHION
page.content: Today the childrens fashion in hair is bobbed,permed,streaked and layered hair. The girl's shoes at the moment tend to be pointed 'jelly-bean'ankle boots or sandals while the boys nearly all wear trainers. We do not wear a uniform for School so the girls tend to wear summery,flowery tops with their skirts or they wear bat-wing V backed suntops with their Bermuder shorts or flying suits. The boys are not as fashion-conscious as the girls and they nearly all wear T shirts with their shorts or trousers. For Games lessons the boys hardly need to change at all were as the girls usually wear leotards and footless tights.
